comment-list.a11y-check_circle: Filters all comments marked as correct
comment-list.a11y-not_interested: Filters all comments marked as wrong
comment-list.comment-stream-stopped: The comment stream has been stopped.
comment-list.comment-stream-started: The comment stream has been started.
comment-list.favorite: Comments you have marked as bonus
comment-list.correct: Comments you have marked as correct
comment-list.wrong: Comments you have marked as wrong

comment-page.a11y-comment_grade: Marks this comment as a bonus comment
comment-page.a11y-comment_not_marked_wrong: Marks this comment as not correct
comment-page.a11y-text_correct: This comment was marked as correct.
comment-page.a11y-text_grade: This comment was marked as a bonus comment.
comment-page.a11y-text_read: This comment was discussed in full view on the beamer
comment-page.a11y-text_wrong: The comment was answered in the negative.
comment-page.comment: Comment {{ comment }} was asked at {{ time }} and has currently {{ votes }}. {{correct}} {{wrong}} {{bonus}} {{beamer}}
comment-page.live-announcer: You are now on the comments page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.live-announcer-moderation: You are now on the moderation page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.mark-read: Discussed by you in full screen mode on the projector
comment-page.new-comment: A new comment with the content, {{ comment }}, has been asked.
comment-page.reject: Remove inappropriate comment from the list
comment-page.search-box-input-description: Here you can search for comment.

content.at-least-one: In multiple choice mode you have to select at least 1 true answer.
content.need-answers: Please add at least two answers.
content.no-empty: No empty fields allowed. Please check subject and body.
content.only-one: In single choice mode is only 1 true answer allowed.
content.only-one-true: In single mode is only 1 true answer allowed.
content.max-answers: There's a maximum of eight answers.
content.same-answer: Same answer label is not allowed.
content.select-one: In single choice mode you have to select 1 true answer.
content.subject: Subject
content.submitted: Content submitted. Ready for creation of new content.
content.format-info: You can choose between the four different question formats 'Choice', 'Likert', 'Yes/No' and 'Text'.

room-page.a11y-gavel: Opens all comments selected by the moderator
room-page.a11y-insert_comment: Opens a window to manage comments
room-page.a11y-person: Opens a window to add moderators
room-page.a11y-question_answer: Opens all questions asked about the session
room-page.a11y-settings: Navigates to a a view with options to manage session, manage comments, and add moderators.
room-page.live-announcer: You're in the session now. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
room-page.room-loading-error: The session could not be loaded

settings.a11y-add-moderator: Add the entered User as Moderator
settings.a11y-moderator-email: Enter the email of the user you want to add as a moderator
settings.a11y-room-name: Give the session a new name here.
settings.a11y-settings-direct-send: Slider to send comments directly to participant
settings.a11y-threshold: Slider for setting the threshold for visible comments
settings.no-bonus: No bonus points have been given yet.
settings.moderator-not-found: No user was found with this E-Mail.
settings.question: Question
settings.tokens-deleted: All tokens of this sessions have been deleted.

session.a11y-description: Enter a description for the session
